name: Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine
summary:
Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine is free fan-made game of Megami Tensei series. This game is free, and for personal use only, not for sale or redistribution. All the rights for Megami Tensei trademarks belong to ATLUS company.
Year 20XX, Neo Tallado City. During the renaissance of biotechnology, the heroine belongs to a group of people who deny body augmentation. In search of a better life, she decides to partake in the Tournament – virtual reality “Devil Busters” games hosted by a multibillionaire François Curbault. At the same time, a serial killer appears in the city and the heroine begins her investigation of best friend’s murder. Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine is the cyberpunk detective story with many moral choices and decisions.
